noBuild.description: Skip build process during deployment. This could result in incorrect deployUrl and baseHref for the deployed application

outputPath.description: This is one of the options you can freely choose according to your needs. --- We will 'deploy' to this folder.

deployIdentifier.description: Unique ID to identify the deploy. Will be used as subfolder on the static host. Leaving it empty will use current branch

previewUrl.description: The URL to access deployed app in the browser (without deployIdentifier). E.g. https://static.host.com/

rsyncUser.description: User used to log in into the rsync host

rsyncHost.description: Host to connect to with rsync

preDeploy.description: List of commands to execute on the host before the deploy over SSH

postDeploy.description: List of commands to execute on the host after the deploy over SSH
